participant_1.name: Isabella Columbus
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Isabella loves exploring new cultures and has a passion for history and art.
participant_1.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i'm an art major in college. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Determined and resilient, Jordan finds strength in challenges and enjoys team sports as a way to connect with others.
participant_2.background: i love playing softball. my mom passed away when i was young. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. my father is in the army. i work in the insurance business.
